# Background Remover - Free Inkscape Alternative

## About
This is a free online background removal tool that serves as an easier alternative to Inkscape's background removal features. Users can remove image backgrounds automatically in seconds without needing complex Inkscape tutorials.

## Key Features
- One-click background removal
- No Inkscape skills required
- Faster than traditional Inkscape methods
- No tutorials needed
- Works entirely in the browser
- Privacy-focused (no uploads to servers)

## Target Keywords
- inkscape how to remove background
- remove background inkscape
- inkscape remove background
- inkscape alternative
- online background remover
- automatic background removal

## Technology
- Built with React and Vite
- Uses Transformers.js for ML processing
- WebGPU acceleration when available
- Tailwind CSS for styling

## Use Cases
- Users struggling with Inkscape background removal tutorials
- Quick background removal without software installation
- Batch processing of images
- Mobile-friendly background removal

## Website
- https://backgroundremover.waicto.com/
- https://bgremover.waicto.com/
